title: The Solicitor-General's Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-solicitor-generals-act | Legal areas: Regulation of Professions

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. As from the commencement of this Act, the office of Creationof
Assistant to the Attorney-General shall be abolished and
the office of Solicitor-General for Jamaica created.     General.
                                                                      Xz::tE:-

provisions.content:

and exercise any of the powers of the Attorney-General.
